owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

milestone_number.description: The number that identifies the milestone.

state.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open` or `closed`.

due_on.description: The milestone due date. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.
